snippet.title: Solace State - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase
snippet.description:
Solace State will be available on Xbox Series X/S and Xbox One in summer 2023 . Watch the trailer to meet the characters, learn about their motivations and story, and get ready to join the young hacker Chloe in the fight against a corporate biotech conspiracy in this narrative visual novel cyberpunk game.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
